document_data.name: ''Missives of Candlekeep''
document_data.author: ''Various''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Missives of Candlekeep''''' was a collection of important letters written by the [[Avowed]] of [[Candlekeep]].
document_data.Description: The letters collected within ''Missives'' were preserved in their original format, down to the handwriting of each letter-writer.
document_data.Content:
Most letters included within the book contained esoteric scholarly information, such as the movements of celestial bodies or specifications of magical [[ritual]]s.

One letter of note was that written by [[Trystan Shale|Trystan P. Shale]] to the famous [[Elminster]] of [[Shadowdale]]. In the letter, Trystan shares with Elminster the whereabouts of the [[sage]] [[Gorion]] and his ward [[Abdel Adrian|Abdel]], along with information related to the individuals known as [[Bhaalspawn]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a copy of this book was left in the [[Emerald Grove]] of the [[Western Heartlands]].
